BNSF #2021 Will Operate Today
Train #2021 scheduled to depart Chicago Union Station at 5:40 PM will operate today. Please disregard the previous alert.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert ME - Homewood East Side Construction Will Begin March 13

Beginning Monday, March 13, access to the Homewood Station from the east will be closed for station construction until Summer 2024.  Access to the boarding platform will be through the Park Avenue entrance ONLY (west side of tracks).

 

Beginning, Monday, March 6, the Pace bus stop will relocate from Harwood Avenue to Park Avenue.  Please allow additional time and use caution near the work zone.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=0&Twitter=0
Metra Alert UP-NW - Clybourn Station Platform Rehabilitation

The north half of platform #2 at the Clybourn station is closed for rehabilitation. Once completed, the work will begin on the south half of platform #2 and into platform #1. The project is scheduled to be completed by the end of July.

Please allow addtional time to access the in-service platform and exercise caution near the work zones.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert ME - Attention Metra Electric Line Riders

Due to the NASCAR events being held in Grant Park July 1-2, two access points to Van Buren St. Station will be temporarily closed starting June 17 until after the event: the path between Jackson St. and the platforms and the path through the “Paris Metro” entrance at Van Buren on the east side of Michigan Ave. The access points at Van Buren on the west side of Michigan Ave. will remain open and Metra Electric service will not be impacted.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=0
Metra Alert - July 4th Schedule/Alcohol Restrictions
Metra will operate a Sunday/Holiday schedule on Tuesday, July 4 (Independence Day). Alcohol will be prohibited on all Metra trains.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert BNSF - Additional Service for Chicago's inaugural street race events Saturday, July 1 and Sunday, July 2

Metra will offer expanded schedules on the BNSF and Rock Island lines for Chicago's inaugural street race events taking place Saturday, July 1 and Sunday, July 2. With anticipated large crowds, alcohol and bicycles are banned on all Metra trains on Saturday, July 1 and Sunday, July 2. Customers should also expect slower boarding at stations due to increased passenger loads and train crews taking extra time to ensure everyone’s safety. Extra service and full schedules are posted here.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert RI - Additional Service for Chicago's inaugural street race events Saturday, July 1 and Sunday, July 2

Metra will offer expanded schedules on the BNSF and Rock Island lines for Chicago's inaugural street race events taking place Saturday, July 1 and Sunday, July 2. With anticipated large crowds, alcohol and bicycles are banned on all Metra trains on Saturday, July 1 and Sunday, July 2. Customers should also expect slower boarding at stations due to increased passenger loads and train crews taking extra time to ensure everyone’s safety. Extra service and full schedules are posted here.

Metra Alert BNSF - Attention Berwyn Commuters: Starting July 5, 2023, Stanley Avenue will be under construction for approximately 14 weeks.
Attention Berwyn Commuters: Starting July 5, 2023, Stanley Avenue will be under construction for approximately 14 weeks. Please use caution through the work zone and allow extra travel time.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=0
Metra Alert ME - 79th street/Chatham Station Closure Beginning July 10 - Station Rebuild Project

The 79th street/Chatham station on the Metra Electric line will be closed beginning Monday, July 10 for approximately 7 months. During this time passengers can use 75th and 83rd street stations as alternatives. This is part of the Metra Electric Community initiative to transform multiple stations on the Metra Electric District. Once completed, stations will have enclosed ADA-accessible street-level entrances, lobbies with elevators, new stairs, headhouses, new composite deck platforms, new lighting, and signage.  For more information click here.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=0
Metra Alert UP-NW - Track construction Saturday, July 1 through Sunday, July 2

Track construction will begin Saturday, July 1 through Sunday, July 2. Trains may incur delays enroute up to 20 minutes behind schedule passing through the work zone. Please listen to announcements for any platform changes. For additional information visit metra.com/constructionnotices.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert ME - Millennium Station Elevator - Out of Service
The Millennium station elevator is out of service. Customers can use the 11th street - Museum Campus elevator.
